verses.verse: Set the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> to thy <S%H2441>mouth<s%>. He shall come as an <S%H5404>eagle<s%> against the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, because they have <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, and <S%H6586>trespassed<s%> against my <S%H8451>law<s%>.
<S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H2199>cry<s%> unto me, My <S%H430>God<s%>, we <S%H3045>know<s%> thee.
<S%H3478>Israel<s%> hath cast <S%H2186>off<s%> the thing that is <S%H2896>good<s%>: the <S%H341>enemy<s%> shall <S%H7291>pursue<s%> him.

They have set up <S%H4427>kings<s%>, but not by me: they have made <S%H7786>princes<s%>, and I <S%H3045>knew<s%> it not: of their <S%H3701>silver<s%> and their <S%H2091>gold<s%> have they <S%H6213>made<s%> them <S%H6091>idols<s%>, that they may be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>.

Â¶ Thy <S%H5695>calf<s%>, O <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, hath <S%H2186>cast<s%> thee off; mine <S%H639>anger<s%> is <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against them: how long will it be <S%H3808>ere<s%> they <S%H3201>attain<s%> to <S%H5356>innocency<s%>?

For from <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was it also: the <S%H2796>workman<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> it; therefore it is not <S%H430>God<s%>: but the <S%H5695>calf<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> shall be broken in <S%H7616>pieces<s%>.

For they have <S%H2232>sown<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%>, and they shall <S%H7114>reap<s%> the <S%H5492>whirlwind<s%>: it hath no <S%H7054>stalk<s%>: the <S%H6780>bud<s%> shall <S%H6213>yield<s%> no <S%H7058>meal<s%>: <S%H194>if<s%> so be it <S%H6213>yield<s%>, the <S%H2114>strangers<s%> shall swallow it <S%H1104>up<s%>.
<S%H3478>Israel<s%> is swallowed <S%H1104>up<s%>: now shall they be among the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%> as a <S%H3627>vessel<s%> wherein is no <S%H2656>pleasure<s%>.
For they are gone <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H804>Assyria<s%>, a wild <S%H6501>ass<s%> <S%H909>alone<s%> by himself: <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> hath <S%H8566>hired<s%> <S%H158>lovers<s%>.

Yea, though they have <S%H8566>hired<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, now will I <S%H6908>gather<s%> them, and they shall <S%H2490>sorrow<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> for the <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8269>princes<s%>.
Because <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> hath made <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%> to <S%H2398>sin<s%>, <S%H4196>altars<s%> shall be unto him to <S%H2398>sin<s%>.
I have <S%H3789>written<s%> to him the great <S%H7230%H7239>things<s%> of my <S%H8451>law<s%>, but they were <S%H2803>counted<s%> as a strange <S%H2114>thing<s%>.

They <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> for the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of mine <S%H1890>offerings<s%>, and <S%H398>eat<s%> it; but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7521>accepteth<s%> them not; now will he <S%H2142>remember<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, and <S%H6485>visit<s%> their <S%H2403>sins<s%>: they shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

For <S%H3478>Israel<s%> hath <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> his <S%H6213>Maker<s%>, and <S%H1129>buildeth<s%> <S%H1964>temples<s%>; and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> hath <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> <S%H1219>fenced<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>: but I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> upon his <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and it shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H759>palaces<s%> thereof.
